overview: The Brothers – Celebrating 50 Years of the music of The Allman Brothers Band performed at Madison Square Garden in New York City for one night only March 10, 2020. The Brothers— Jaimoe, Warren Haynes, Derek Trucks, Oteil Burbridge, Marc Quinones—were joined by Duane Trucks and Reese Wynans and special guest Chuck Leavell.
title: The Brothers
